DescriptiveMatcher

public DescriptiveMatcher(double basicCoefficient,
                          double structuralCoefficient,
                          double ancestorCoefficient,
                          double immediateChldCoefficient,
                          double leafCoefficient,
                          double siblingCoefficient,
                          double threshold,
                          java.lang.String fileName)
Default construct of of the class.

Parameters:
basicCoefficient - - coefficient of the basic similarity.
structuralCoefficient - - coefficient of the structural similarity.
ancestorCoefficient - - coefficient used in the structural similarity, it corresponds ancestors similarity
immediateChldCoefficient - - coefficient used in the structural similarity, it corresponds immediate children similarity
leafCoefficient - - coefficient used in the structural similarity, it corresponds leaves similarity
siblingCoefficient - - coefficient used in the structural similarity, it corresponds siblings similarity
threshold - - level of accuracy requested.
